title: Hamburgefonstiv T-shirt Available as fast food
content:
Shameless Plug to follow, read at your own risk!!

I have produced a T-shirt which I will have available at TypeCon but if anyone else would like a copy, let me know. The more takers, the cheaper the price.

Here is an image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090928220242im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hamburge2a_4913.jpg)

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: Mark me down for one, ’L’ please. I assume the image will be a bit smaller than this on the actual shirt?
I’ll be at TypeCon and get one for sure, large also. Will you have some dark colored shirts?

Si,

This is the approval file they sent me from the factory doing the printing. There was a note on it that said, “some adjustments may have to be made in size for printing” so you may be right about that but I won’t know for sure until they arrive.

ChrisL

Bill,

This is the only color combination being printed. I couldn’t afford to have the multiple color combinations done but the red is not really that light and it won’t show dirt. I kind of went with the fast food colors thing.

ChrisL

\>This is the approval file they sent me from the factory doing the printing.

Fair enough. I’m sure they know what they’re doing.

Cheers, Si

Even if some folks are not going to TypeCon and are interested in a shirt, they can let me know.

ChrisL

To verify. one size large for William and one size large for Si?

See me in Seattle :-)

ChrisL

...and a Diet Coke. :)

So, Chris...when will you be ready to “Face the World”?

Diet cokes are bad for you, Terry :-)

I’ll be trying to face the world within the next few months.

ChrisL

Yo dezcom, here’s what I want...

You know that funky double G lig of your Froggy face? I want that in black, bigg, on the front of a white tee. And on the back, up between the shoulder blades, I want ’Froggy’ and just below that your URL, ok? Thanks!

Royalties?

Yo Neil,  
 I have been working on something similar, stay tuned :-)

ChrisL

PS: You da bomb man!

[cross-promotion available here…](http://web.archive.org/web/20090928220242/http:/typophile.com/node/36327)  
and more pictures can be seen [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090928220242/http:/www.typeoff.de/?p=188)

Fontplayer,  
I think I sold my shirt supply at TypeCon but I don’t know what may be left. The good folks at SoTA need a breather and some time to sort the whole thing out—and they are all AtypI bound so I can’t answer you until later.  
If at least 6 other folks are interested, I will get more printed.

ChrisL
Chris, add one to the group of interested people. I hope I’ll see you at ATypI!
